alert.note: Alert for Adair; Chariton; Macon; Putnam; Randolph; Schuyler (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 4:15AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Adair, northern Randolph, northeastern Chariton, southeastern Putnam, southern Schuyler and Macon Counties through 500 AM CDT... At 415 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles west of Queen City to near Novinger to 12 miles southwest of Kirksville to 12 miles northeast of Bucklin to near Callao to 9 miles southwest of Bevier to 8 miles north of Salisbury. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kirksville, Moberly, Macon, Huntsville, La Plata, Bevier, Queen City, Novinger, Greentop, Atlanta, Downing, Callao, Cairo, Brashear, New Cambria, Jacksonville, Gibbs, Millard, Worthington and Elmer. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Adair; Chariton; Macon; Putnam; Randolph; Schuyler
